item.title: PowerShell Universal On-Startup Script
item.description: I’ve been playing with PowerShell Universal for almost a year now, and I thought this would be a great place to share some tips, tricks and scripts that have helped me out. And what better place to start than the On-Startup.ps1 script? That’s the script that I have configured to run when our PSU server starts.
